201001.n: PhD Seminar in Finance V: Research Paper I

201102.n: PhD Seminar in Finance V: Research Paper I

201601.n: PhD Seminar in Finance V: Research Paper I

201701.n: PhD Seminar in Finance V: Research Paper I

catList: In this course, doctoral students are expected to write a research proposal, conduct literature review, or replicate in part an existing research paper in the field.  The course guides her/him through the various stages involved in formulating a research question, investigating existing literature on the topic, and executing preliminary scientific analysis.  The course is aimed to be a first step in writing a dissertation proposal.
